title: Hadoop Developer
description:
Do you want to be part of an organisation that is currently undertaking one of the biggest digital transformation programmes in the UK?

Here at DWP we have some fantastic opportunities for Hadoop Developers who are confident working with big data technologies to support new and innovative analytic solutions.

As a Hadoop Developer you will be responsible for delivering all aspects of code development activities to meet user needs to agreed timescales.

You will also contribute to the Loading and running of bulk data transfers, creation of scripts to support the cleansing and scrubbing of data.

We are looking for candidates who have:

Hands on experience in design and development of Hadoop solutions and integrating new technologies as they develop.

An in depth understanding of ETL concepts, ETL loading strategy, Data archiving, Data reconciliation, ETL error handling, error logging mechanism, standards and best practice.

Strong Coding skills in SQL and UNIX shell scripting capabilities.
